org.elasticsearch.index.store

Class IndexStoreConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.store.IndexStoreConfig

  • public class IndexStoreConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    IndexStoreConfig encapsulates node / cluster level configuration for index level IndexStore instances. For instance it maintains the node level rate limiter configuration: updates to the cluster that disable or enable indices.store.throttle.type or indices.store.throttle.max_bytes_per_sec are reflected immediately on all referencing IndexStore instances

      • INDICES_STORE_THROTTLE_MAX_BYTES_PER_SEC_SETTING

        public static final Setting<ByteSizeValue> INDICES_STORE_THROTTLE_MAX_BYTES_PER_SEC_SETTING
        Configures the node / cluster level throttle intensity. The default is 10240 MB
